name: cpanel - dark
description: A dark style for cpanel web management portal.
css:
/* i really want this to be global */

/* This style is created as a Global style and will only effect cpanel. */

#cpanel_body, 
#cpanel_body #heading-top-billboard,
#cpanel_body #content,
#cpanel_body .stats_left, 
#cpanel_body .stats_right,
#cpanel_body .highlight,
#cpanel_body .col1,
#cpanel_body .col2,
#cpanel_body .col3,
#cpanel_body .col4,
#cpanel_body .special_col1,
#cpanel_body .special_col2,
#cpanel_body .special_col3,
#cpanel_body .special_col4,
#cpanel_body .special_col5,
#cpanel_body .yuimenuitemlabel,
#cpanel_body .row-even,
#cpanel_body .row-odd,
#cpanel_body .info-even,
#cpanel_body .info-odd,
#cpanel_body .mainpopbg,
#cpanel_body #hilight-box,
#cpanel_body .sa-box,
#cpanel_body .directory,
#cpanel_body .usage-bar,
#cpanel_body .directory-wrap,
#cpanel_body .total,
#cpanel_body .dt_module,
#cpanel_body .vertical_half,
#cpanel_body .create-button
{
background:#000 !important;
}
#cpanel_body, #cpanel_body a, 
#cpanel_body td,
#cpanel_body .action_link,
#cpanel_body h1,
#cpanel_body h2,
#cpanel_body .status,
#cpanel_body .desc,
#cpanel_body .directory,
#cpanel_body .total,
#cpanel_body .h1Title
{
color:#FFF !important;
}
#cpanel_body .total
{
text-shadow:none!important;
}
#cpanel,
#cpanel_body h3, 
#cpanel_body .index_box_header,
#cpanel_body .footer_ul,
#cpanel_body .yuimenuitemlabel:hover,
#cpanel_body .clickable,
#cpanel_body .sorttable_nosort,
#cpanel_body .dt_header_row th,
#cpanel_body .sortable th, .nonsortable th, .dynamic_table th,
#cpanel_body .hd
{
color:#FFF !important;
background:red !important;
}
#cpanel_body .success_details,
#cpanel_body .bd
{
color:#FFF !important;
background-color:darkgreen !important;
}
.yui-skin-sam #subleft,
.yui-skin-sam .yui-dt8-col-mimename,
.yui-skin-sam .path,
.yui-skin-sam #topnav ul,
.yui-skin-sam #srtoolbar ul li,
.yui-skin-sam .icon-publichtml,
.yui-skin-sam .yui-dt-liner,
.yui-skin-sam #srtoolbar ul,
.yui-skin-sam .yui-dt8-col-file,
.yui-skin-sam .yui-dt8-col-size,
.yui-skin-sam .yui-dt8-col-mtime,
.yui-skin-sam .yui-dt8-col-mimetype,
.yui-skin-sam .yui-dt8-col-nicemode,
.yui-skin-sam .yui-dt-bd,
.yui-skin-sam .yuimenuitem 
{
background: #000000 !important;
}
.yui-skin-sam .yui-dt-selected td,
.yui-skin-sam .yui-dt-selected td div
{
background: red !important;
}
.yui-skin-sam table,
.yui-skin-sam a,
.yui-skin-sam li
{
color:#FFF !important;
}
